### Official Announcement
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) extends an Invitation to Tender for the Fox Den Gully Dredging 2023 project in Pigeon Hill, New Brunswick. The solicitation number is WS3849325264.

### Description of Work
The work under this contract involves the provision of dredging services, including mechanical dredging and dump scow or barge operations, in the Fox Den Gully Channel, Gloucester County, New Brunswick. The project will be executed in accordance with the plans and specifications for PWGSC Project Number R.123322.001.

### Important Details
The estimated cost for this opportunity falls within the range of $500,001 to $1,000,000 (HST included). Standard bid and contract security for the construction is required. The selection criteria for this contract are based on lowest price.

### Contact Information
For further details, please refer to the tender notice URL or contact Sonia Stockman, Contracting Authority at PSPC, at sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

[Tender Notice URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15264322?extsite=MTUyNjQzMjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)                                                    
Note - This is a government tender and unlike other tenders published by government, it has a more specific and detailed Request for Proposal (RFP).
